attributes.action: BAN ALL INCINERATORS THAT PRODUCE POWER FROM HOUSEHOULD AND TOXIC WASTE
attributes.additional_details: BAN ALL INCINERATORS THAT PRODUCE TOXIC EMISSIONS, BECAUSE THE HEALTH IMPACTS HAVE NOT BEEN RESEARCHED, THE ONE PROPOSED AT MERTHYR TYDFIL , WILL EMMIT 7.5 TONNES OF MERCURY 18.9 TONNES OF LEAD AND 140 GRAMS OF DIOXIN, OVER THE NEXT 35 YEARS. THE EUROPEAN CLEAN AIR ACT SHOULD PROTECT US AGAINST THIS, IT  STATES ;THAT WHERE  AIR QUALITY IS GOOD IT SHOULD BE MAINTAINED, AND WHERE IT IT IS BAD IT SHOULD BE IMPROVED.THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD IMPOSE THIS ON THE INCINERATOR FIRMS ON OUR BEHALF.         THERE ARE 80 NEW ONES PROPOSED , SO YOU WILL BE EFFECTED
